title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.29 - Time of last race
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.29 - Time of last race

State Regulations

Each night's racing program shall be scheduled to be
completed prior to midnight. On Saturday night no race shall be called on the
track that cannot within reasonable expectation be completed before midnight
and in no event may betting be conducted after 11:57 p.m. on said night and the
presiding judge shall cause the machines or other devices used for wagering to
be locked by such time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4101.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
